DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to assess the adherence and the efficiency of a home-based training program on muscular strength, endurance and the quality of life, fatigue, physical activity, anxiety and depression for colon cancer patient treated by chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Adherence and Efficiency of a Home-based Training Program on Muscular Strength, Endurance and Qol for Colon Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: It's a 9-weeks experimentation with 4 moments (every 3 weeks) to do the tests.
DOC.criteria: Colon cancer patients treated by chemotherapy adjuvant Patients who have metastasis Patients hospitalized during the experimentation Patients who have major orthopedic or neurologic problems
